item.title: Spawn a new npc after certain health
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

here is my “npc” command code.

[code] } /* else if (command.startsWith(“npc”) && playerRights >= 3) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);
sendMessage(“You spawn an npc”);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}
}*/ else if (command.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

                if (newNPC >= 0) {
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0),
                            heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10,
                            absY + -10, 1,
                            server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                    sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such NPC.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
            }[/code]

here is the code i tried this time…

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1158 && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP <= 0){ server.npcHandler.newNPC(1160, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(1160), false); sendMessage("Prepare for the 2nd form!"); }
Still does not work

item.source: Spawn a new npc after certain health

item.title: Spawn a new npc after certain health
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, it is killing me to try and get this on a non-dodian based server…I am trying to add to the kq what Jad has in DeltaScape, where if the NPC is a certain HP, it will spawn a new npc. I am trying to make the Kalphite Queen 2 forms, and it compiles with no errors, but does not spawn the 2nd form. Here is the codes I am using from DeltaScape. I am sure I need to add something else…but here they are.

Method:

public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(npcID, (absX), (absY), height, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX - 3, absY - 3, 0, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false); }

Code to make the 2nd form:

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1158 && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP <= 0){ server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(1160, 3485, 9483, heightLevel); sendMessage("Prepare for the 2nd form!"); }

That is the code that if the KQ has 0 or less hp it will spawn 1160, the 2nd form, at cords 3485, 9483…

But, as I said, it does not work. What do I need to add/edit to get this to work?

Help is GREATLY appreciated…and yes ill rep you if your crazy about a little number…

Read full topic
item.source: Spawn a new npc after certain health
